title: Apple might be developing a “Mac Studio”: A mightier Mac Mini
content:
Apple has slowly been transitioning the Mac lineup from Intel to its own silicon. And as more Macs get a taste of the M1 chip, the company continues working on even more powerful processors for future models. While we anticipate the rumored Mac Mini 2022‘s reveal, it seems that Apple is also working on a

The post Apple might be developing a “Mac Studio”: A mightier Mac Mini appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Apple is reportedly working on a Mac Studio. It is said to be a Mac Mini with mightier internals. Here's what we know about it.
